meanings.def: the action of an object moving in a circle around a central fixed point
examples: the daily rotation of the earth on its axis
the earth's rotation around the sun

meanings.def: one complete movement in a circle around a fixed point
examples: This switch controls the number of rotations per minute.

meanings.def: the act of regularly changing the thing that is being used in a particular situation, or of changing the person who does a particular job
examples: crop rotation/the rotation of crops (= changing the crop that is grown on an area of land in order to protect the soil)
job rotation (= the practice of regularly changing the job that a particular person does so that they become experienced in different areas)
in rotation Wheat, maize and sugar beet are planted in rotation.
The committee is chaired by all the members in rotation.
